Topic.Title: Rules for Radicals By Saul Alinsky - 1971

Message.Msg: Angry? When you're holding all the cards in the game, you're NEVER angry. I'll tell you who's losing sleep right now...(G)rover. He's worse than any lobbyist for big oil or defense, and he's about to be neutered.

Message.Title: SPPI end of yr .15c DIVIDEND. Short Squeeze!

Topic.Title: Rules for Radicals By Saul Alinsky - 1971

Message.Msg: The only course for the Repub's would seem to be to pass a bill which reinstates the tax cuts for those below $250k and send it to the Senate. Unless the Dem's won't bring it up in the Senate it will get Repub Senator's vote. Then wait to see what happens.

Message.Title: IBM retirement plan bad for workers
Message.Msg: Hey, shills - do you think that firms run in an employee vacuum? Well, IBM sure does because while the posts about SHAREHOLDER VALUE GOING UP UP UP, the discontent among the American workforce, what little is actually left as we Roadkill our way to 2015, is going DOWN DOWN DOWN and that impact long term. Look for those contract accounts to become very unhappy with INDIA as American workers leave by choice or are RIF'd before 12/15/2013. Hey, anything to save money eh right??? http://finance.yahoo.com/news/ibms-latest-retirement-move-bad-162141970.html

Message.Title: The Fed
Message.Msg: The Fed will keep interest rates low until the unemployment rate hits 6.5%. Now all we need is for more people to leave the workforce to get the jobs rate down to 6.5%.

Topic.Title: IBM retirement plan bad for workers
IBM making same dumb move HP made

Message.Msg: Ruining morale of 23% of a workforce that management wishes was only 15% is obviously a low priority for IBM management. Personally, I would never advocate my son or daughter to work for IBM, but from a stockholder perspective, they will make their 2015 objective.

Topic.Title: IBM latest pension cut hits older employees hardest.....again.

Message.Msg: There is no pension cut.You retire at anytime you lose nothing.
